attributes.action: Scrap all plans to introduce the congestion charge into the borough of Greenwich
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Greenwich council has asked for the congestion charge to be introduced into the borough of Greenwich. This is not needed. The council need to concentrate on the current road layout in Greenwich town centre and this will solve all congestion.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
